about_message:
*CrazyOnes* is a _Telegram bot_ that keeps you updated on Apple's operating system and software releases.

Type /help for information on how to interact with the bot.

Developed by [_Geek-MD_](https://github.com/Geek-MD/CrazyOnes)
help_updates: â€¢ _/updates_ - Show last 10 updates in your language
help_updates_tag: â€¢ _/updates [tag]_ - Show last 10 updates filtered by tag (e.g., _/updates ios_)
help_language: â€¢ _/language [code]_ - List languages or show updates (e.g., _/language en-us_)
help_description: This bot monitors Apple's software update releases and sends you notifications when new updates are available.
updates_no_updates: â„¹ï¸ No updates available yet for your language. You'll be notified when new updates are published.
updates_header:
ğŸ *Apple Updates - {display_name}*

Here are the 10 most recent updates:
updates_invalid_tag: âŒ Invalid tag format. Only letters, numbers, hyphens, underscores, and spaces are allowed.
updates_found_tag:
ğŸ *Apple Updates - {display_name}*

Found {count} update(s) for tag *{tag}*

updates_not_found_tag:

Did you mean: {suggestions}?
